name: Don't Get Caught
summary: "Embark on a virtual reality adventure with up to 9 friends in a captivating bookshelf lobby, where an intermission timer leads to a hamster tube map challenge. Dodge a mischievous hamster, use one-time weapons strategically, and customize your character in vibrant lobby shops. Play with friends or in public lobbies for a dynamic social experience. Are you ready for the adrenaline-pumping journey of Hamster Tube Escape?"
